sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>Deployment manager will have the ability to submit a bulk time for availability </acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group display_value="Hikon Professional Services" name="Hikon Professional Services">0ea124de4f6463007e72aa95d310c750</assignment_group> <category/> <company display_value="BrightStarr">c507ddfa4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c79b</company> <description>The Deployment Manager will have a screen where he can assign a team (ServiceNow group) & availability, this will be for a 30 days ahead and the option will be a bulk update. in example: choose a group choose a user from that group (not mandatory - if not selected, will be apply to all team members) choose date range choose hours Submit </description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 15:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp/> <notes/> <number>TAS0001142</number> <package display_value="PACK0001018">b395341f4f6027007e72aa95d310c7fc</package> <short_description>Book Time - Avaialble slots</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-27 09:21:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>293cdb6d4ff867007e72aa95d310c7ba</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>matt.parker@unily.com</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-28 16:28:12</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
